ingredients.item: 8 thick slices 2-day-old bread (better if slightly stale)

method.step 1: In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and cinnamon. Stir in the orange zest and/or triple sec if using. Whisk the mixture until well blended and pour into a shallow bowl, wide enough to place a slice of the bread you will be using.

method.step 2: Place each slice of bread into the milk-egg mixture, allowing the bread to soak in some of it.

method.step 3: Melt some butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Shake off the excess egg mixture from the bread and place the bread slices onto the skillet. Brown on one side, then flip and brown the other side.

serve.serve: Serve the French toast hot with butter, maple syrup, and/or fresh berries.

method.step 1: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.

method.step 2: Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth.

method.step 3: Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat.

method.step 4: Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Brown on both sides and serve hot.

serve.serve: Serve the pancakes warm with butter, maple syrup, and fresh fruit if desired.

method.step 1: Butter one side of each slice of bread.

method.step 2: Place two slices, buttered side down, on a skillet over medium heat. Add cheese slices on top.

method.step 3: Top with the other slices of bread, buttered side up. Cook until golden brown and the cheese is melted, flipping once.

serve.serve: Cut in half and serve hot.

method.step 1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, and ginger. Sauté until onion is translucent.

method.step 2: Add chicken cubes and cook until browned.

method.step 3: Stir in curry powder and cook for 1-2 minutes.

method.step 4: Add coconut milk and diced tomatoes. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes.

serve.serve: Serve hot with rice and garnish with fresh cilantro.

method.step 1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, sauté until soft.

method.step 2: Add ground beef and cook until browned. Drain excess fat.

method.step 3: Stir in taco seasoning and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.

method.step 4: Warm taco shells according to package instructions.

serve.serve: Fill taco shells with beef mixture and top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

method.step 2: Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.

method.step 3: Spread pizza sauce evenly over the dough. Arrange mozzarella slices on top.

method.step 4: Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

serve.serve: Garnish with fresh basil leaves, drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper before serving.

method.step 1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Butter a 4x8 inch loaf pan.

method.step 2: In a mixing bowl, mash the ripe bananas with a fork. Stir in the melted butter.

method.step 3: Mix in the baking soda, salt, sugar, beaten egg, and vanilla extract. Add the flour last and mix until just combined.

method.step 4: Pour the batter into the loaf pan. Bake for 60-65 minutes or until a tester comes out clean.

serve.serve: Let cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Slice and serve.

ingredients.item: 2 cups semisweet and/or milk chocolate chips

method.step 1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper.

method.step 2: In a bowl, whisk together the flour and baking soda. Set aside.

method.step 3: In a separate bowl, cream together the butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Mix until combined.

method.step 4: Gradually add the flour mixture, then stir in the chocolate chips.

method.step 5: Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto the prepared baking sheets. Bake until golden, about 10-12 minutes.

serve.serve: Let cool on wire racks and enjoy warm or store in an airtight container.

method.step 1: In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, and vegetable broth. Set aside.

method.step 2: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 1 minute.

method.step 3: Add all the vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.

method.step 4: Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir until well coated and sauce thickens.

serve.serve: Serve hot, garnished with sesame seeds if desired.

ingredients.item: 1 large head of romaine lettuce, chopped

method.step 1: In a large bowl, combine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

method.step 2: In a small bowl, mix Caesar dressing, anchovy fillets, garlic, and lemon juice.

method.step 3: Pour dressing over the salad and toss well.

serve.serve: Serve immediately, garnished with additional Parmesan and croutons if desired.
